gate.creole.ontology.impl.sesame

Class UtilBooleanQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.creole.ontology.impl.sesame.UtilBooleanQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ontology.OntologyBooleanQuery

    public class UtilBooleanQuery
extends Object
implements gate.creole.ontology.OntologyBooleanQuery
    A class representing a Sesame ASK Query. This class makes it easy to use a boolean query and reuse a query with different variable bindings.

    The following steps should be carried out when using this class:

    1. Create an object and pass on the repository connection, query string, and query language constant
    2. Set any variables for the query using setBinding(java.lang.String, gate.creole.ontology.LiteralOrONodeID) one or more times
    3. Evaluate the query using evaluate and retrieve the boolean result.
    4. To reuse the query, repeat from step 2
    Author:
    Johann Petrak
